NCKU Sharing Scooter

Avatar

In E-Scooter, everyone can customize their intelligent virtual avatar. Users can not only decide avatars' genders and colors but also dress them up.

Pre-Booking

Students can access their curriculums to E-Scooter, then apps can show their curriculums and help them pre-book the scooters.

LeaderBoard

Students can earn points by riding e-scooter or completing tasks.

Scooter Location

You can look for the idle scooter by the app so that you can save tour time.

Statisitcal Forcasting

By choosing the park-lot on the map, student can see the data of e-scooter usage on each hour.

Earn Free Time

Through mission or effectiveness & credibilty of using E-scooter, earn as many points to level up your character and boost ranking!

Avatar

In E-Scooter, everyone can customize their intelligent virtual avatar. Users can not only decide avatars' genders and colors but also dress them up, including choosing different customs and doing their hairstyles. Moreover, by upgrading and joining particular events, users can get special accessories.

17% Readed
Pre-Booking

By accessing curriculums for E-Scooter, students can check their curriculums and decide between which two classes they need to use scooters, and then E-Scooter helps them pre-book the scooters. Furthermore, E-Scooter can display the number of scooters and parking spaces at the starting and ending stations.

34% Readed
LeaderBoard

By riding the e-scooter for a certain number of hours or by accomplishing tasks of varying difficulty, students can earn points. Further, prizes will be awarded to the top performers on the monthly leaderboards.

50% Readed
Scooter Location

Do you have the experience of going to the bike spot but there is no bike?Or sometimes you want to return the bike but the spot is full of bike.With e-scooter app, you won't have to look for the scooter any more. It will show you where the idle scooters are or the empty space.Making it more convenient to get the scooter.

67% Readed
Statisitcal Forcasting

This function is build for predicting the rush hours of the campus e-scooter system, with this function, student would know which time they less likely to found a e-scooter around them and student can use e-scooter system with more flexibility.

84% Readed
Earn Bonus Time

The higher ranking you are , the more bonus time for you.Through mission or effectiveness & credibilty of using E-scooter, earn as many points to level up your character and boost ranking!

100% Readed
